entry.title: Face My Fears
entry.summary:
Author: MysticRose1992

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,376Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 1,186

Summary: During what Red Hood thought was just a routine check of all of the warehouses in his territory, making sure no new gang was going to start a gang war, he stumbles upon a scene that would haunt his nightmares. A Death Cult about to sacrifice a child that could be no older than 4. After dealing with the cult members, Jason finds himself the new caretaker of a 4 year old toddler that also happens to be able to turn invisible when startled. What could possibly go wrong?

entry.title: Bruce Wayne and the Secret of Wizardry
entry.summary:
Author: Darknight2020

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,799Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 18

Summary: “Bruce Wayne is not just a semi-normal Hogwarts student, Clark noticed. He was definitely hiding something or he’s too suspicious to be anything but normal! It all lined up in Clark’s mind — his disappearances in the night, his unusual ability at being good at things that a regular student should not be, the rumours of him blowing up stuff (and sometimes actually being on the verge of), his literal age is something that school and students should be concerned about, for sure!…yet Clark every time proves himself slightly more wrong than before.The Guy of a Year is definitely someone who makes him float in middle of a night in restricted section of Library’s ceiling, while holding aforementioned Guy to not let them both fall on the poor Mr. Filch and his cat.”_______________________________________OR Harry Potter Au!Superbat fic with some detective and drama shit that for some reason nobody wrote?

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,735Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 50

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.
